text: Knema communis is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree found in Peninsular Malaysia and Singapore. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * Chua, L.S.L. 1998. Knema communis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Knema communis
